review_text: Near the hotel I stayed during my business trip. Not a very crowded restaurant but no doubt the food is nice.

Good Japanese restaurant, famous on noodles. Fried rice and dumpling also test good. Lunch time most likely will be full only dinner time you can take your time there to enjoy the foods and drinks.
